page.title: 12SPORT
page.content: The Rugby Club colours are green and black with gold hoops. There are about 60 people in the club which started its first season in November 1982. They have two teams and their home ground is the Leisure Centre.At the Deepings Leisure Centre there are a number of sports such as squash, badminton, and basketball.There are a lot of clubs in Deeping for sports like rugby, bowling, running and swimming.The tennis club and the cricket club share the same premises near open farmland to the north of the village. There is a cricket pitch, one grass and two hard courts.At the football club are junior teams, youth teams and a men's team which often plays at Stamford, Peterborough and Spalding. A new football club is being built in Towngate.
